website_summaries.verdict: The Petty Ankle Boot comes in a variety of colors in either leather, suede, or Brahma hair. This iconic bootie is perfect for walking around town or pairing with a new outfit.
pros: Cute, comfortable, and true to size
Easy to wear with skinny jeans, skirts, and dresses
cons: Minimal traction – not good for icy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the steep price!
customer_reviews.text: I had these boots in my house for a few minutes and the coating on the heel began to peel away. I assumed at this price, the heel would be an actual stacked wood heel and not a piece of plastic with a wood veneer sticker over it. Lame! I'd rather shell out another $100 and get a pair of Fryes, or pay half the price of these boots and get something in the same quality range as these. NOT worth the price for the shabby quality. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: high maintenance

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful, super cool kicks! They also fit perfectly and are comfortable, very important for a walker like me.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up, don't even 1/2 size up....super cute boots.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boot....but if you have narrow feet...don't size up, don't even 1/2 size up. I usually wear a size 7 and I bought the brown ones with the fleese inside...so I ordered a 7.5 based on the reviews that said to size up. Well, they are big, I should have ordered a size 7. I can wear them with my super thick socks...and that will work for me. But, if the store were next door....I Would return them for a size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Carolann

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice shoes, the suede feels really nice and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my booties one day before I was expecting it. They are very nice shoes, the suede feels really nice and they are what I was hoping to receive. I got them for a very good price so no regrets there, I took one star off because they will need some breaking in as I felt they were a bit too narrow for my feet. Overall these booties are very versatile and will go well with tons of outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Peep1989

customer_reviews.title: Small Toebox, Large Heel Area, No Cushioning but very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Wide feet and bunions beware that this may be an uncomfortable fit. I found the toebox to be small even in the Wide width, and the heel area to be too big so that the back of my foot slipped and the shoe flopped. A smaller size and my toes would be scrunched together. I normally wear an 8.5 W and a 9 in tennis shoes. I got the 9W and found them to be uncomfortable. There is no padding in the sole, and while the leather looks high quality the sole and heel do not look build to last. They are definitely cute but not worth the pain in my case.
customer_reviews.author: lovinlife

customer_reviews.title: Best Booties Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! When I first got them (saddle leather), I wasn't sure about the fit, so I ended up ordering other sizes/widths from another store. It turned out that the original pair I bought here on Amazon fit the best (true to size). I have gotten so much use out of these booties already and they are unbelievably comfortable! I walked a mile in them with no discomfort, which is often hard for me to do in a shoe with any sort of heel, as I've broken both my feet of the years, which makes heels somewhat uncomfortable after a while usually. I would highly recommend these booties (I've already purchased another pair in the black suede)!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love so much I wore them out!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second pair. Wore the first pair out. Love the style, color and fit. Have both black and putty. Super comfortable, true to size. No break-in period for me. Can wear barefoot or with thin sock or tights. Great versatility. Goes well with dresses and pants. I bought my first pair at Nordstrom several years ago (retail price) and my next three pair from Amazon. Bought on sale and couldn’t beat the quality and price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SAN

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later, lots of wear, but look and feel BRAND NEW!
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and lots of wear later and these look brand new thanks to the stacked heel. I was terrified for the first month that the hair was going to rub off, but it has all stayed. I treated them with spray for waterproofing suede, and it seems to have worked great. These have worn so nicely- they still look great, the low heel is very comfortable, and I wear them with everything: jeans, tights, dresses, all of it. My favorite shoes hands down.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect! They go with pants and dresses and my legs don't ache at the end of the day from wearing heels. I tend to stand most of the day at my desk and I walk about 8000 steps a day at work; these shoes are so comfortable. I need to buy more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: I ordered half size up because some reviews recommended it, but I returned them and will get ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are really confortable, the length is true to size. So beautifil and elegant. As other reviewers say, it elongates the legs, something difficult in booties, and more if they have no significant heel. A little snug around the toes, but not really bothersome, because leather stretches. I ordered half size up because some reviews recommended it, but I returned them and will get my usual size. However, I bought them in saddle brown and the color is nothing close to what you see in the website. It appears rich brown and soft leather, but it is quite dull and stiff, looks cheap and plasticky. I will get them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Putty color too pale, Stiff but loosen with wear
customer_reviews.text: I ultimately returned the putty color and bought the cognac brown. The putty color looked almost white to me and I did not like it. The booties in general are a little stiff, but after a few weeks of wear they are getting softer and more comfortable. They’re holding up well with wear so far. I do think you could find a better price for these elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NLopie

customer_reviews.title: Love my boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable and look great. So glad I spent a little extra because of the leather and excellent craftsmanship. The boots do not have any padding so if you need that type of support you'll need to supply that. Thin socks are perfect with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great color and really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots. I am very picky with my footwear and especially boots because many tend to make me look like I have huge feet (size 8) and I'm not a fan of that. I am getting used to how these look because of the cowboy-ish feel but they are so comfortable and versatile that I don't care. My only issue is that they scrape so easily and my clumsy feet aren't helping. I have a few scrapes on the tip of both boots and have to figure out how to fix it, if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rororo

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Very comfortable and just what I need for a boot in NY that looks nice. I wear an 8 1/2 and these are slightly too large but in the winter I wear thick socks and I am grateful for the extra room. I am disappointed that the toe is starting to chip a bit and the heal has a chunk out of the laminate. I do wear these every day in NYC so there is almost no shoe that can stand up to that abuse. I think these look great and are very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I like the putty color and am certain I'll be able ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the putty color and am certain I'll be able to wear them with many different pieces in my closet. I'm not as in love with them as I was anticipating-- they're not AS comfortable as I was hoping but again, they'll get the job done. I also purchased a pair of Jack Rogers booties at the same time and fell head over heals in love with those so I think that also might be skewing my perception of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday bootie
customer_reviews.text: These are a great basic, everyday bootie at a very affordable price point. Neutral color, low heel, easy zip. Just a note of caution that the sole was quite slippery at first – just needed a little wear to scuff it up. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Scherr

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy because I love love love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I thought at first I would have to send these back because they felt a bit narrow (I have a wide foot). I started wearing them around the house with thick socks for a couple hours a day and that seemed to work. I am so happy because I love love love these boots. I don't wear them for everyday because I fear because they are suede that I wouuld get them dirty. But I do wear them for dress up and they look great. I think I would like to buy another pair, only I would order something other than the suede so I can wear for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Super soft booty
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter for xmas. Very cute boot. Super soft material. She says she usually has to size up for Sam Edelman’s boots however she said these fit true to size. I gave it 4 stars because the first pair I got were worn w scuffed bottoms and scraped heels. It was quickly returned and a new pair was sent before they received my return just in time for Xmas. Wet much appreciated that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Negron

customer_reviews.title: They are a comfortable shoe and look great
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this boot in several different colors and wear them with jeans and skirts. They are a comfortable shoe and look great. I have had many compliments on the boot. The thicker heel gives a very good support. I bought my first pair 3 years ago and have since purchased 3 more pairs ( different colors) .
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Strange shape. Too narrow at the toes and width wise. But too large in the heel. The ankle opening is also way too large for me. The sizing/cut of this shoe is just not for me. Looks good on other people though.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, stylish ankle boot
customer_reviews.text: Saw these boots on a lady I don't know and had to come up and ask about them! Found out the details and thought they were a bit expensive so didn't buy but kept coming back to them over two years, always tempted to purchase but I'm cheap. Finally just bit the bullet and ordered them and can't believe how they are even better than I imagined they'd be: comfortable, stylish and easily dressed up or down. They have an understated presence when you walk in a room and pull together an outfit. Would not hesitate to buy these again and regret waiting as long as I did!
customer_reviews.author: reallyDAN

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this bootie!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I was looking for - a black leather bootie that is comfortable to wear. Having purchased another shoe by Sam Edelman, I knew what size to order. The heel height is great for jeans. The leather is good looking. I ordered black. I am pleased with it. I think I can even wear it with a trouser sock which will be good in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!!! I wear a 6 or 6.5.......a 6.5 more consistently these days. The 6.5 was definitely big on me - sliding up & down on my heel. The 6 is perfect in length & a bit tight in width but will have them stretched a little in no time. LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...chipped heel.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I have the exact same boots in a different color and they are great...ordered them in the black suede and the heel feels cheap and was chipped/cracked in a few spots. Had to return them and now I’m searching for a replacement. I would think for the price, the quality would be better!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hart

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, more grey than tan.
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy and I got them for a great deal. The Putty color is a lot more grey than tan though, the photos aren't really true to color. Decided to keep them anyways as they're a good neutral shoe that I can wear with skirts/dresses in the spring and the price was right. Someone mentioned they're a little tight in the arch, which is true, although even wearing them for just a day they've stretched a bit. the leather inside is nice and soft so i didn't have to wear socks, which would have probably made them feel a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: KateP

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, just buy! Perfect bootie!!!
customer_reviews.text: The almost thousand reviews do not lie. I have been searching for the right bootie high and low. I have purchased booties ranging in price from 430-100. And not one liar provided me the comfort that this shoe gave me. I cannot wait for rock these. Finally I found the exact shoe that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Nice bootie
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in putty. For the price point, it’s a good bootie. The heel is just the right height and the leather stretches and molds nicely to your feet. My only complaint is that the soles are slippery. There is zero traction.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fiend

customer_reviews.title: Too wide in heel area
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were too big for me. I'm a true 7.5 and though the length was fine, they were extremely wide at the heel/ankle part of the boot such that my foot moves up in the boot with each step I take. Also they were so loose in that region that my feet could slide out of the boot without even unzipping. My feet are fairly normal if not a bit narrow in the heel area. I don't think sizing down would help given that the length seemed fine. Besides that, the boots were cute and I would've probably kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Made narrow
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and stylish but they definitely run small. I’ve always worn an 8 (R) and have never needed a wide width. Based on the reviews I decided to go up half a size and I’m glad I did, they fit perfectly length wise. I’m not sure how I would’ve gotten my foot into an 8. Unfortunately, this shoe is just made narrow. I can get my foot in but when I stand and walk around, the sides of my foot are being squeezed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roggers

customer_reviews.title: booties are great
customer_reviews.text: the putty color is a little fragile- do NOT get them wet if you can help it because the stain will last. i bought another pair in black. very cool boots!
customer_reviews.author: dgodfrey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely All Black Boot For Work!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Perfect boot for fall. Can be worn with work slacks and jeans. A sharp all black boot with a low heel (perfect for commuting/walking around). Well structured, the top of the boot sits right above my ankle and the toe is slightly almond shaped. Would buy in brown color. :)
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Morris

customer_reviews.title: Have these in the black suede and LOVE them - cute as can be and get lots ...
customer_reviews.text: Have these in the black suede and LOVE them - cute as can be and get lots of complements when I wear them. These dark brown ones are nothing special - if I didn't need the color, I would have sent them back, as the leather looks fake to me, rather stiff, and even the style is lacking in this color. BUT, they are very comfortable, fit well, and I've had such success with the black ones that I decided to keep them. If you are looking for a "basic" dark brown boot" that is comfortable, you might want to give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Comfortable & Very Attractive Boot.
customer_reviews.text: This boot does not disappoint. I ordered a size 6 and the fit is perfect. The black leather is beautiful. I wore them in my home for a day, and out to an evening engagement. We did a lot of walking and it felt as though I had worn them many times before. I plan to order another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: MAT — Fort Worth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: First shoe came in with specs of black and dents in fabric. I returned and ordered another one. This one comes with a chipped off zipper and the fabric along the zipper is sewn haphazardly. How disappointing. I am doubting the quality of those sold here. Will be ordering from Nordstrom..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable. Doesn’t rub against my ankle like some ankle boots do. Size is accurate and I sprayed it with waterproof spray for suede. Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.author: Arele

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these petty style boots. my favorites to wear for work or casual. comfortable. price is reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Nice ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: I loved these booties straight out of the box! Beautiful, soft, creamy suede and fit perfect when I tried them on. They arrived on the date promised and well packaged with each individual boot being protected from scratches and rubs during shipment. They look well made...I know only time will tell. Since they are light colored they will be a great addition to my wardrobe year round and I look forward to wearing them. I do plan on treating them with some kind of suede treatment product. The light color is gorgeous and I will be heart broken if they get damaged from rain or anything else that might stain them. I would recommend these booties.
customer_reviews.author: Curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like these boots, but I had to return them. I saw several reviews that stated that these boots were 1/2 size too small. Mine seemed 1/2 size too big! 95% of my shoes are size 6, medium width (maybe a little on the narrow side). The width was good, but the length and the overall fit seemed a little too big. I'm afraid that the side of my ankle bone will end up rubbing too much against the inside of the shoes to be comfortable for more than just an hour of walking. I wanted to try 1/2 size smaller, but slate color doesn't come in the size I want.
customer_reviews.author: Heathlie

customer_reviews.title: The zipper helps the bootie to slip right on and off easily, and I appreciate that
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these, because my bone colored, low shoes were worn out. I always need this color throughout the winter in my wardrobe, as it's so neutral and blends with so much. Also it breaks the boredom of wearing black and brown. The zipper helps the bootie to slip right on and off easily, and I appreciate that. It's so very comfortable, but I must say that I'm cautious in wearing it for long periods or in the bad weather, because the color is light and I feel a little protective. This is no doubt one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: meggie496

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 7 M this boot fit like a narrow show would. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: kathy gripshover

customer_reviews.title: First time trying & first pair of Sam Edelman’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: First time trying SAM EDELMAN’S shoes. A little disappointed on the fit - thought it’d be “a right fit”... for the price of the shoe -
customer_reviews.author: YANET EARP

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but very narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they are very narrow in the toe box. I have bunions so bought shoe stretchers and now they are a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Who?

customer_reviews.title: Cute booties
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and comfortable once you get them on. There are a couple of cons, and I did consider returning them.. For one, they are pretty narrow. I have a thin to average foot and I have to wiggle a bit to get them on. Once they're on, I don't notice/feel the narrowness, though. The other drawback and that the bottom is smooth. There's no grip to it at all. If you live in a snowy/icy climate, that can be problematic. I'm probably going to have to look into putting something on the bottom, as I'm pregnant and don't want to risk slipping on ice.
customer_reviews.author: EmtotheMax

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! I have not worn them enough to be giving an accurate review. They are a tiny bit small width wise but because they are leather they will stretch out. Love the light colored suede. They look great with rolled up jeans, dresses and skirts. I will wear them more in the fall. It has already gotten too hot to wear them. I love that the zipper on the side is hidden. Buy them, you will love them. Might go up a half size but remember they will strech!
customer_reviews.author: Ann_H

customer_reviews.title: A TRUE CLASSIC!
customer_reviews.text: VERY COMFORTABLE AND CRAFTED BEAUTIFULLY! THIS BOOT WILL GO WITH JEANS OR A NICE WOOL SLACK. IT IS IDEAL FOR FALL AND WINTER. I AM VERY PLEASED, AND I THINK YOU WILL BE ALSO, ESPECIALLY IF YOU LIKE A CLASSIC LOOK.
customer_reviews.author: Frances M Bennett

customer_reviews.title: These are great and the only issue I have is with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great and the only issue I have is with the width at the toe. It isn't crazy narrow but if you are walking in them for awhile it might be uncomfortable. I wear them to work at my desk job so it is only a little bit of time on my feet and it is obviously fine. I have worn them out at night where we are just walking a short distance to dinner or whatever and also fine.
customer_reviews.author: makeuper

customer_reviews.title: Shin splints!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these so badly. They look so cute and the quality is decent. However at the end of the day (and lots of walking), my shins were killing me and didn’t go away for two days. I think it’s because the width is good, but there’s too much length in the toe area. I always wear a size 8 ALWAYS and found these to be slightly too long, but the width was perfect. It’s definitely a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Min7840

customer_reviews.title: Too tight!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eyes in these for a long time before I finally purchased them, and I was so sad when I got them and they were too tight. Like waaaay too tight. And my foot is on the narrow side! I didn't even bother to try another size because I could tell fit was going to be too much of a problem. They were beautiful to look at though.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Love These Booties!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing these Sam Edelman Petty Booties since they first came on the scene last year but, the price was a little too steep for me. But, I patiently waited until I could get them for under $100 and they were definitely worth the wait! These booties are cute, comfortable, and fit true to size. They look good with jeans, skirts, or dresses. Do yourself a favor and get a pair. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: The Size 9M is my normal size. The Petty boot felt true to size and fit better than I expected. I wore them when traveling, walked all over the Atlanta airport, and they were still comfortable. I have metatarsalgia and add orthotics to every shoe I wear, including these. Ideally, I'd like a bit more cushioning in these boots. The soles are smooth, so the boots are slippery in snow. I love the sleek style. you can dress it up or dress it casual. The heel is slightly western, but not heavy duty cowboy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Shades of grey...
customer_reviews.text: Usually I purchase med width shoes and boots. I am borderline wide. Actually, one bot fit fine, the other a tad small in the shoe box inside of which I now have a shoe horn. These are cute as a button. The suede is soft and they appear to be well-made. The color of the "putty" looks different on 10 different web sites. Next to light grey, they appear light tan and next to light tan they appear light grey. Regardless, they are very light in color.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Fit is not forgiving
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly disappointed. I’ve had my eye on these for over a year and the fit is just not what I expected. It rubs the foot the wrong way in a few places and it is really tight on the toe area. I wish the 7.5W was available to try, but now I am stuck with 8 :(
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so pretty! The fit is perfect and they are as comfortable as a slipper. My mom (they were a gift) said that she can work on her feet all day without her feet aching or hurting at all. These shoes are not only pretty but comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Passion 4 Style

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice looking booties but I could not even get my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice looking booties but I could not even get my foot into them. I wear a size 9 and up sized as some people recommended. They also have a really tight toe box that even if I could have got the shoe on would have been very uncomfortable to wear for any length of time. They are of very high quality if you can stand to have your feet smashed into a boot all day.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I went with the Moss color which is perfect and rather lovely
customer_reviews.text: Just received these beauties today and the fit is a bit narrow but there is room for stretch if you have a wider foot. My foot might just be a little sore because I am in the process of breaking in my new converse sneakers. I went with the Moss color which is perfect and rather lovely. Love the low heel and simple style. I plan to wear these throughout the fall and spring with various outfits. In other words, Great buy......
customer_reviews.author: Daneen A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Always a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I always love Sam Edelman shoes and booties. They fit, are comfortable and wear well. I must have them in 10 colors and love every pair. I can order them online because I know in advance they are a perfect fit. They are also versatile. I love wearing them with pants, jeans or with leggings and a tunic.
customer_reviews.author: hse52

customer_reviews.title: I love these booties but can't say if they are comfy ...
customer_reviews.text: I found that these run a bit large, and the width, on my foot was too wide. I have flat wide feet, ordered my normal size, but found that I had too much room. My foot slid to the toe, which caused my heel to slide up & down, and they just looked bulky around the ankle area. I love these booties but can't say if they are comfy or not, I had to return these for a half size smaller. I can say that the color is exactly as pictured, and they look very nice also. Now i'm just waiting to get the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Teena D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute boots ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Heel is just right height. Very comfy. Dislike that the liner was not placed accurately on right one! (see photo)
customer_reviews.author: Birdella

customer_reviews.title: Style and fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe and for some reason, only the suede style fits best- the hard leather styles of the same brand hurt my feet in the toe bed. I think the suede has more “give” and now I am enjoying my new bootie!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the exact style of bootie I was ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little concerned about the narrow width of this shoe. After reading many of the reviews, I decided to give them a chance. After all, they were fabulous. Great quality and the exact style of bootie I was looking for. After a couple of hours of wearing them around the house with thick socks, I could tell they loosening up around the ball of my foot. By the second day I had worn them to work, they had broken in nicely and fit beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Heavy leather & a well made outer sole
customer_reviews.text: These are great.Heavy leather & a well made outer sole. The shoes really dont have the inner sole to support your arch and heel properly, which shouldn't be a probably with typical wear. I am on my feet for 10+ hours each day and my feet were a little fatigued after a long day but adding/changing the inner sole will quickly fix that. I bought the black & burnt umber, which has a bit of a red tone to it.
customer_reviews.author: sarita

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Bootie
customer_reviews.text: Waited all season for these to go on sale, but they never did. Got these at the end of the season, when all other sources were either sold out or much more expensive--these were the Holy Grail of booties for me. I'd probably have put up with these even if they were uncomfortable. They are a bit tight in the toebox, but I seldom wear them all day, and they should stretch out with more wearing. I'm happy with my purchase, and anticipate wearing them for years!
customer_reviews.author: ridingwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great style, good comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the saddle leather color and they match EVERYTHING. I love the style. I can wear them all day but can't WALK in them all day because the soles are hard so my feet get tired. They are not a "squishy" comfort-type shoe, but that should be obvious from the product description. They are just the tiniest bit loose on me, but with a Dr Scholl's insert, the footbed is a bit softer and they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect - beautiful, supple leather, and they're as comfortable as though I've had them for years. I have a pair of Sam Edelman's suede boots that also fit perfectly, so I ordered these short boots in the same size. I would definitely recommend them and will probably order the caramel ones too!
customer_reviews.author: JanD

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for black booties for a while - tried a number of styles, brands, price points, materials - and was really thinking these would be the ones!! They're simple and understated so I expected that they'd go with almost everything. When I got them, I wasn't blown away (although, to be fair, I didn't think I would be - they're simple shoes), but even after trying them on with multiple outfits (different styles - casual, more outdoorsy, dressed up), I always ended up choosing another shoe. For the price point, I don't think these are worth it. I feel like you could find a similar off-brand for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Sam Edelman Leather Ankle boots
customer_reviews.text: Sam Edelman NEVER disappoints!! These boots are great...a true BROWN ( it's hard to find a true dark brown). The heel is everyday easy but still cute with jeans or a skirt. The leather is rich and supple but durable too. I ALWAYS order my Sam's 1/2 size bigger for socks; they fit TRUE TO SIZE. They were EBay expensive but still a much better deal than the mall!! The style is simple but classic. I know that I will own these for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: New Reader

customer_reviews.title: This is a really cute boot, but it fits ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute boot, but it fits a bit narrow. They are also rather "clacky" when you walk in them. My biggest problem was that they rub in the heel, and I knew it would make them incredibly uncomfortable to wear. I didn't want to have to send them back but I knew that I would probably never wear them due to the discomfort when walking. I think these would cause some major blisters. Very cute boot though.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy H

customer_reviews.title: In love with these booties...
customer_reviews.text: If I could wear these boots everyday I most certainly would. They are very comfortable and the fit is true to size...I'm a size 7 and they're perfect! The suede is so soft...I have worn them all day without any discomfort. They really do add to any outfit...jeans, leggings, skirt or dress w/tights! Be aware that they are definitely for looks tho...there is no traction on the sole, so they're not recommend for walking on snow or icy surfaces! I may end up ordering a pair in another color...who knows! Very happy with my purchase...LOVE-LOVE-LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style at a good price for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased these shoes in the putty color and have received so many compliments on them that I purchased the black as well. Great fit and style at a good price for a leather bootie. I have worn both pairs all day and never had any foot pain or blisters. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LBG

customer_reviews.title: Leather rubs off
customer_reviews.text: Loved these, bought them over a year ago but living in Texas I don't wear them very often. When I got them out to pack for a recent trip I noticed the "calf fur" peeling off! These are not cheap shoes, so I would think twice on this color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. DeWolfe

customer_reviews.title: I just love Petty's and what a fun print
customer_reviews.text: The new Modern Ivory Snake print are very narrow. I own three pair of Petty booties and remember having to wear them in but these feel VERY narrow and I'm not sure if they'll stretch when broken in? Debating returning them...I just love Petty's and what a fun print! I have contacted customer service at Sam Edelman asking if they will offer a wide version of the bootie. I will report back with their answer
customer_reviews.author: Sarak

customer_reviews.title: My go-to work shoes, I have three pair. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to work shoes and a wardrobe staple, I have three pair in black leather, black suede and putty suede. The suede is low-pile so it isn't so wintry looking, esp in the putty color - I wear the putty and the leather year round. I wear a standard size 12M.
customer_reviews.author: Lucile

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bootie
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect booties. I can wear them all day with out any pain, which is rare for boots. They accent my ankles perfectly and the natural color work well with everything; jeans, skirts, dresses... etc. They're more casual than most, so I wear them often. They wear well too, I've worn them a lot over the past few months and they still look great.
customer_reviews.author: H Gray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots, soft leather and a wonderful color. However, they were somewhat small across the toe area on the right foot. If they had fit with socks on, they might have stretched; but I did not want to take that chance. So, I returned them. (so sad!)
customer_reviews.author: M. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful shoes. They match every outfit
customer_reviews.text: Based on looks, I give these 5 stars. They are beautiful shoes. They match every outfit. They look great with jeans and dresses. The only reason why I gave 4 stars is because the heel is not real wood, it is covered in a wood sticker product and is easily scratched. It is very disappointing based on the price of this product. I wore these all over France. They are lightweight and very comfortable. I absolutely love them and want them in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe that lacks comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the look and style of this shoe. I was searching for a little black bootie for some time. They fit as expected. I normally wear a 7.5 and the 7.5 fits. I'm rating this product with 3 stars as they are uncomfortable for the price. My feet hurt after only being in them a couple hours. Good looking shoe but am disappointed with the comfort at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Haraldson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bootie in Putty and I love them. Perfect color for now and also for going into spring and summer. I plan on wearing these all year long! As some other people stated they do run narrow but that didn't bother me as I have narrow feet. If you are looking for the perfect bootie to wear with skinny jeans, boy friend jeans rolled up, skirts, shorts, etc....don't hesitate to buy these....you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Nettieb

customer_reviews.title: Black Suede Beatle boots for a man !
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for black suede Beatle type boots for men forever and they're always too pointy...these are a size 12 in women's..I wear a size 10 in mens and these boots fit and look perfect!! Great quality. Somewhat pricey because they're such a large size in womens shoes but well worth it !!
customer_reviews.author: ROCKY J

customer_reviews.title: Great style but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I have previously owned a pair of the same boots (2 years ago). The style is great and the color is nice. However, I have only been wearing these boots for two days and the inside is already shedding onto my socks. This is really terrible and I did not expect the quality to have declined so much. I am really disappointed in this purchase, especially given the price of the product. Would return these shoes if I could :(
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: Go-to boots!
customer_reviews.text: I always feel great when I wear these boots! The texture is nice, good construction, comfortable wear. Took 1 or 2 days to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: mehh.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a strage taupey color- that is more gray than neutral. They also looked akward on my foot. I went out and bought a similar pair from Nordstrom BP that looks 100 times better.
customer_reviews.author: roxana

customer_reviews.title: They aren't the most comfortable bootie I've ever worn but they are SO cute
customer_reviews.text: They aren't the most comfortable bootie I've ever worn but they are SO cute. Very high quality and I think will possibly get more comfortable with a lot of wear. So far have only worn them once but for about 8 hours without issue.
customer_reviews.author: obiwan

customer_reviews.title: Fit is narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow I couldn't even fit the front of my foot in boot! Sent back! Nice boot if it fit!
customer_reviews.author: Dog lady

customer_reviews.title: they are super cute and beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: The boots are lighter in color than they appear in the picture. I was looking for more of a charcoal color, and they are a medium gray. However, they are super cute and beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was able to stretch them out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these booties online and they were very, very tight the first time I tried them on. I googled around and found a recommendation where one has to wear thick socks, wear the boots while heating the leather with a hairdryer. I tried this on 3 occasions and now the boots fit well and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, beautiful but too tight!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Both the color and heel are perfect. They are a nice leather. They were perfect in every way except they are just too narrow. I have a normal width foot, so these are running narrow. I kept trying them on to see if they would loosen a bit, but even with the thinnest socks they are too tight to wear to break in. Going up a half size would make them too long. Alas... I returned them today.
customer_reviews.author: JulieKru

customer_reviews.title: Made of different material than store bought shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this shoe. Only complaint is that the store bought shoe was made of leather and this shoe seemed like an imitation leather. Looked like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Finley

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Best Price for GREAT SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Amazon had the best price! The shoes look great and feel great. They are true to size, as i wear a 9.5 and that is the size i purchased. They are very well made and I can wear them all day with no discomfort. I have a very neutral foot and do not find the arch support to be lacking at all. Hope to buy another pair in the future!
customer_reviews.author: ChelseySmentkowski

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much. They are classic and stylish. I received lots of compliments on them. I did eventually ruin them though, because I got paint on them. I love them so much that I will be getting another pair! After purchasing them, the first thing I did was take them to the cobbler and have a sole put on them. I recommend doing that, so they can last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: *Lin*

customer_reviews.title: Go-to travel shoes- second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair- replaced a scuffed pair that I had worn for a year. I travel about every-other week meeting clients, and these are my go-to travel shoes during the colder months- they pair well with pants, leggings, dresses, and can be dressed down or up.
customer_reviews.author: lemonseleven

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were surprisingly narrow. I have normal to narrow feet, but these were very tight. I almost couldn't get them on. My toes didn't quite hit the end, so the length would have probably been fine if it wasn't for the vice grip around the rest of my foot. I didn't try to stand up in them, though, because I was afraid of putting any more pressure on my feet, so it's possible even the length is too small. The construction seemed solid; the leather was soft and beautiful, so I might try the "wide" size. I was really hoping they'd work.
customer_reviews.author: Mnemosyne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these so often, they're starting to show it. So I bought another back up pair! Because they're a light colored suede, they will start to show the crease over the top. I also get the scuffed back of the heel from driving. So, now I've got the distressed for day to day and the new ones when I want a more put together look!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I did find them comfortable and did not have any walking issues
customer_reviews.text: Chic! I was pleasanty surprised when I opened up the box and put on my booties...very stylish and chic. I have only worn them twice and out for dinner so I didn't do much walking. I did find them comfortable and did not have any walking issues. The arch support is much, but for short amount of walking, I think they will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patti H

customer_reviews.title: Lovely booties, just not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these with leggings, but I think you'd need to have pencil-thin legs for these to work with skinny jeans. I love the color and the fit was spot-on as always with this brand, but they just weren't right for me. I am 5'7" with long lean-ish legs.
customer_reviews.author: MomNMore

customer_reviews.title: Love the Black Brahma (cow hair) shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the Black Brahma (cow hair) shoes! The Brahma provides a classy texture without being wild versus boring black leather. (By the way, people should not rate a product poorly because they don't read enough to realize that they are ordering a cow hair boot.) These fit as expected, do not order up a size. (I'm an 8.5)
customer_reviews.author: V. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fall Bootie!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gorgeous boots and can't wait to wear them this Fall. I wear a 5.5 in closed shoes and these fit perfectly. I'm petite and the top of the boot hits me just where I'd want it. Many times, boots are made at the same height for all sizes and fit poorly on smaller women. That's not the case for these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bootie. The color is absolutely gorgeous and will go with almost anything. It is very comfortable which is a must for me as I have a lot of foot problems. I probably could have worn a 6.5, but will keep the 7 which is normally what I wear in a closed shoe as my left foot is a whole size bigger than my right foot. I usually just use an insert in the right shoe to balance it out. You will love these booties.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are a little weird.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of part of the boot was a little darker than what is in the picture. It’s a darker brown. But it still looks nice. There’s a drastic difference between the size 7 and 6.5. I bought the 7 and it was huge. Felt like almost an 7.5 on my feet. So I returned it and ordered a 6.5. They are a bit snug but much better than it being too big. But it’s a very pretty boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot
customer_reviews.text: Great looking boot, but it's a bit loose in the heel and pinches in the toes at the end of the day. Seems very well made. I noticed a friend of mine happens to have the same boots and they have lasted her for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite style and brand of bootie. I have this style 8in several colors and leathers. Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: S. scott-young

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Petty Ankle Boot
product_meta.description:
Iconic sam edelman bootie

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.Granted 'cult favorite' status for combining comfort, style and versatility, the must-have bootie features a low, stacked heel and ankle zip
